de.szut.dqi12.cheftrainer.connectorlib.messagetemplates

Class TransactionMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.szut.dqi12.cheftrainer.connectorlib.messages.Message
      • de.szut.dqi12.cheftrainer.connectorlib.messagetemplates.TransactionMessage

  • public class TransactionMessage
extends Message
    The TransactionMessage should be used by the client application. It should be send, when the user wants to remove an offer or accept an offer to one of his Players.
    Author:
    Alexander Brennecke

    • Constructor Detail

      • TransactionMessage

        public TransactionMessage(Transaction tr,
                          boolean accept,
                          boolean remove)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        tr - a Transaction object, which is full initialized and represents the offer, that should be accepted/removed etc.
        accept - true = the offer is accepted.
        remove - true= the offer should be removed out of the database.

      • TransactionMessage

        public TransactionMessage(org.json.JSONObject json)
        JSON Constructor
        Parameters:
        json - the JSONObject. Create it via "createMessageContent()".
